topic: How to generate translucent plastic with TMesh2Rad
body:
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. ------=_NextPart_000_000F_01C3FA62.1BE2E720 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1" Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable Dear Sir, I was wondering how you would create a translucent smooth surface that = will respond well to the triangle smoothing of TMesh2Rad. I have tried Trans, Trans2 without success, and have found very little = documentation on transfunc, which I believe is the correct way to = approach this problem. Thank you for your time, Yours truly, Ling Xiao ------=_NextPart_000_000F_01C3FA62.1BE2E720 Content-Type: text/html; charset="iso-8859-1" Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
